actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution designating minority membership on certain standing committees of the House.

summary.text: Elects the following Members of the House of Representatives to the specified House Committee: (1) Mr. Konnyu to the Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries; and (2) Mr. Shays to the Committee on Government Operations and the Committee on Science, Space and Technology.

titles.title: A resolution designating minority membership on certain standing committees of the House.
